For beginning, app brings F1 Calendar with all session times and even more, a countdown to upcoming Race Start. Next it gives You the opportunity to track current Standings - both Constructors Championship and Drivers championship. And all with various widgets. Apart from this, You can track You favourite teams with WCC Grid Widget, which can be customised to show Constructor standings for Your preferred teams.

Widgets are updated on regular basis with aim to bring latest result as soon as possible for entire 2022 F1 season.

The APP of Dolomiti Superski is supposed to be a real online ski guide for those who want to discover the world’s largest ski carousel and is supported by all the operating systems of the most common smart phones. It has new graphics and a modern navigation: horizontal movements (swipe) allow users to switch from one of the 12 ski areas of Dolomiti Superski to the next in numerical order, while vertical movements (scroll) lead to various menu options, functions and services within the chosen ski area. If the GPS function of the device is activated, when the APP is launched, the system will lead to a contents page for the Dolomiti Superski ski area in which the user is located. One can login through the "MyDolomiti" community, after having registered (free of charge) to use the services. The APP offers useful information such as the open/closed status of individual lifts and slopes in real time, opening hours of the lifts, breaks, weather forecasts, points of interest such as ski schools, ski rentals, infopoints, Pick-up Box, as well as descriptions and contacts. 
The user will also find other interesting and popular functions, such as the Performance Check, Tracking option to record the route taken while skiing, Routing which will navigate you to a predetermined point on the slopes. By reaching certain goals with the "Tracking" function, the user will be assigned interesting Badges - a great way to challenge yourself! And finally, you get to play too since the registered members of the APP-community can also have fun with the APP's game functions, creating their network of friends, who must also be registered members and in possession of a Dolomiti Superski ski pass and challenging each other throughout the ski season.
Discover the new APP’s full potential watching the video tutorials.

The DUOTONE Academy App
A unique tool to improve your kiteboarding skills in no time!

The Duotone Academy App is designed for aspiring kite surfers wanting to reach the next level. No matter if you are a rookie or an experienced rider, the Duotone Academy App will show you what’s next in your progression. From beginner lessons to advanced freestyle moves, wave riding and foiling, the app offers tips & tricks for each kiteboarding discipline and level. To also give you the opportunity to work on your kiteboarding skills off the water, Duotone has teamed up with Porsche to bring their TAG Heuer Porsche Formula E Team experience and expertise to kitesurfing. Reshape the way you train, become more athletic and get the best out of every session! In addition, the app allows you access to our Super Coaches, including professional riders like Aaron Hadlow, Lasse Walker, & more. Get tips from the world’s best and land the trick of your dreams. Become part of the community and connect with passionate kiters from all over the world!

What it’s all about:
- More than 200 tricks & fitness training
- Six kiteboarding disciplines
- Get in touch with riders from all over the world
- Learn from the best

LEVEL UP your riding
- Watch the correct execution of a trick/study lesson videos/follow the how to’s, read the descriptions, and memorize the key elements

all-new stage

- Improve your strength and mobility with our Porsche Motorsport workouts

Stay MOTIVATED

Use the app WHEREVER you are

Become PART of the DUOTONE family
